game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Game board for the game Ringgz.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wouter Bezemer, Wiljan Vinke

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public int index(int row,
                 int col)
        Calculates the index of a given Field from their row and column number.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the Field
        col - The column of the Field
        Returns:
        The index belonging to the (row, column)-Field

      • isField

        public boolean isField(int index)
        Checks if a Field with the given index exists on this Board.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the Field
        Returns:
        true if 0 <= index < 25

      • isField

        public boolean isField(int row,
                       int col)
        Checks if a Field with the given (row, column) exists on this Board.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the Field
        col - The column of the Field
        Returns:
        True if 0 <= row < 5 && 0 <= col < 5

      • getField

        public Field getField(int i)
        Returns the Field at the given index of this Board.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the Field
        Returns:
        The Field at the given index

                      int col)

        Parameters:
        row - The row of the Field
        col - The column of the Field
        Returns:
        The Field at the given row and column

      • getFields

        public Field[] getFields()
        Gives the whole array of Fields on this Board.
        Returns:
        An array of 25 Fields

      • adjacent

        public java.util.Set<Field> adjacent(int row,
                                     int col)
        Gives a Set of Fields that are adjacent to the given Field.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the Field
        col - The column of the Field
        Returns:
        A Set of Fields adjacent to the given Field

      • adjacentBase

        public boolean adjacentBase(int index,
                            Color color)
        Checks if there is a base of the given Color adjacent to the given Field.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the Field
        color - The Color to check for
        Returns:
        True if there is a given Color base on an adjacent Field

      • calculateValue

        public void calculateValue(Player player)
        Calculates a value for playing on each Field. The value is based on whether you get a majority on the Field, if it allows you to play on new Fields around it and if a base will prevent the opponent from accessing new Fields.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player for which the values gets calculated

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the board and empties all the fields.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the board state. Also includes numbers on the columns and rows.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
